channel.title: Hardware Mute Hack
channel.description: I have a lovely Dell Precision M70 as my main development machine. It's a notebook so is great for when I am travelling around and has more than enough grunt to handle a few VMWare images running at once for...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by GregM+00:00
item.description: Yeah, I've thought of doing something like this several times for my dell. I think I have some old plugs around here somewhere. I've been getting better about remembering to mute the darn thing before leaving the office, but I still forget on occasion.
item.dc:creator: GregM

item.title: Comment by MikeC+00:00
item.description: Have you misspelt the word 'collected' in this article? I believe in the context you have used it, the word should be spelt S-T-O-L-E-N :)
item.dc:creator: MikeC
